edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_library.patron

Class LibraryAccountSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_library.patron.LibraryAccountSystem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AccountManager

    public class LibraryAccountSystem
extends java.lang.Object
implements AccountManager
    The library account system defines the methods and users of the Wolf Library implementation.
    Author:
    Marcus

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LibraryAccountSystem()
      The constructor instantiates the library account system.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addNewPatron(java.lang.String id, java.lang.String password, int num)
      The add new patron method allows the administrator to add a new patron to the database.
      void cancelAccount(java.lang.String id)
      The cancel account method removes a patron if the particular id supplied matches a patron in the list.
      Patron getCurrentPatron()
      The get current method patron returns the patron currently logged in or null (if no patron is currently logged in.)
      boolean isAdminLoggedIn()
      The admin logged in method checks to see if the admin is currently logged in.
      boolean isPatronLoggedIn()
      The is patron logged in method checks to see if a patron is currently logged in.
      java.lang.String listAcounts()
      The list accounts method lists the user accounts for the library database.
      void login(java.lang.String id, java.lang.String password)
      The login method accepts login credentials from the dialog box.
      void logout()
      The logout method clears the current patron and sets the logged in boolean to false.

        public void login(java.lang.String id,
         java.lang.String password)
        The login method accepts login credentials from the dialog box. It then sets the current patron to the one whose credentials were verified.

        password - the user's password

        Specified by:
        addNewPatron in interface AccountManager
        Parameters:

        password - the new user's password
        num - the maximum number of books this patron can check out

        The cancel account method removes a patron if the particular id supplied matches a patron in the list.
